name: Hungry AI
description:
Hungry AI 

Eat more food than the Hungry AI. Dominate the arena, and eat the AI if you want :) or be eaten?? Choose your destiny. 

keyboard control : arrows key or wasd to move  , space to jump, left shift to run.

Features: 

- smart Ai;

-gamepad ready( easy to play).

-original song created; 

- small  screenshake

- character ability: eat AI;

- smooth character control
